text: Allahe etiya tomalokara bhara laghara karaile arau te'om aragata ye, tomalokara majata durbalata ache, seye tomalokara majara esa jana dhairyasila byaktiye dusa janara oparata bijayi labha karaiba, arau tomalokara majata ehejara thakile allahara anujnakrame sihamte duhejarara oparata bijayi labha karaiba. Arau allaha dhairyasilasakalara lagata ache
